instruction.title: Technical-Kinetic SVG Generation
instruction.purpose: Generate mid-century modern style SVG illustrations with kinetic art influences, B&W technical aesthetic
instruction.prompt:
Create an SVG illustration of {{subject}} in the Technical-Kinetic style.

Style Requirements:
- Mid-Century Modern meets kinetic art
- Black and white only (no grayscale)
- Clean geometric forms
- Precise technical linework
- Bauhaus/Swiss design influence
- Motion implied through repetition or rays

Technical Constraints:
- Pure SVG markup (no embedded images)
- Maximum 50 path elements
- Viewbox: 0 0 400 300
- Use only: line, circle, rect, path, polygon
- No gradients, only solid fills

Output:
```svg
[Complete SVG code here]
```

Briefly explain the design choices.
instruction.system_prompt: You are a graphic designer specializing in mid-century modern and technical illustration. Your SVGs are clean, geometric, and print-ready.

examples.output: SVG with concentric circles emanating from central tower, geometric base, radiating lines suggesting transmission
examples.notes: Good use of repetition for kinetic effect

changelog.changes: Initial version based on gemini-image.md Technical-Kinetic style
